mapper.insert: insert into integral_coupon (coupon_id, coupon_name, coupon_money, fromtime, totime, use_scope, platform, getstarttime, getendtime, integral_number, maxnumber, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, state) values (#{couponId}, #{couponName}, #{couponMoney}, #{fromtime}, #{totime}, #{useScope}, #{platform}, #{getstarttime}, #{getendtime}, #{integralNum}, #{maxNum}, #{createId}, #{createtime}, #{updateId}, #{updatetime}, #{state})
mapper.select: SELECT coupon_id,coupon_name,coupon_money,fromtime,totime,use_scope,platform, getstarttime,getendtime,integral_number,maxnumber,create_id,create_time, update_id,update_time,state FROM integral_coupon WHERE coupon_id=#{couponId}

SELECT coupon_id,coupon_name,coupon_money,fromtime,totime,use_scope,platform, getstarttime,getendtime,integral_number,maxnumber,create_id,create_time, update_id,update_time,state FROM integral_coupon WHERE #{date} BETWEEN getstarttime AND getendtime AND state=1 ORDER BY update_time DESC
